metadata.synopsis: Beleaguered professor Ned Brainard (Fred MacMurray) has already run into a pile of misfortunes with his discovery of the super-elastic substance "Flubber." Now he hopes to have better luck with a gravity-busting derivative he's dubbed "Flubbergas." Ned's experiments, constantly hampered by government obstruction, earn the consternation of his wife, Betsy (Nancy Olson). But a game-winning modification to a football uniform may help Ned make the case for his fantastic new invention.

reviews: Flubber has returned in all its bouncy sparkle in Son of Flubber.
Fun, harmless sequel to the Disney classic.
The goo still flew in this fun Disney sequel.
